Enumeration Type Documentation

enum FW_STATE

represents registered callback function state of mxcam_boot_firmware function

Enumerator:
FW_STARTED 

started firmware download over usb

FW_COMPLETED 

completed firmware download over usb

Function Documentation

int mxcam_boot_firmware ( char *  image,
char *  opt_image,
void(*)(FW_STATE st, char *filename)  callbk 
)

mxcam_boot_firmware: boot the camera firmware over usb

Parameters:
*image : eCos/linux kernel image name
*opt_image :initrd image in case of linux, NULL for eCos boot
*callbk :register the callbk function pointer here, _callbk_ will be invoked before and after the file transfer over usb
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_PARAM - if any one of the following condition meet

  • devhandle is NULL
  • image is NULL
  • callbk is NULL
MXCAM_ERR_IMAGE_SEND_FAILED - if send fails
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
boot the camera with image and/or opt_image.
as a status, function callbk will invoked before and after the file transfer over usb with FW_STATE.In case of eCos boot,opt_image will be NULL. In case of linux, opt_image will be initrd image.
